Title: Relates to a refugee resettlement program
Summary: Directs the department of social services to establish a refugee resettlement program with the goals of achieving economic and social self-sufficiency, assisting victims of human trafficking, and assuring proper foster care for unaccompanied refugees.
LawCode: Amd ยง358, Soc Serv L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the social services law, in relation to a refugee resettlement program
